actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of the General Services Administration to provide technical assistance to cities to implement programs which are designed to increase the use of carpools by computers.

summary.text: Carpool Service Act - Authorizes the Administrator of the General Services Administration to provide technical assistance to cities to aid in the implementation of programs which are designed to increase the use of carpools by commuters.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of the General Services Administration to provide technical assistance to cities to implement programs which are designed to increase the use of carpools by computers.
